sourcesContent: import React from "react" const Card = (props) => { return( {props.name} #{props.id.toString().length === 1 ? "00"+props.id : props.id.toString().length === 2 ? "0"+props.id : props.id} {props.types.map((type) => { return( ); })} About {props.weight / 10}kg Weight {props.height / 10}m Height There is a plant seed on its back right from the day this Pokémon is born. The seed slowly grows larger. ); } export default Card;
